descriptionHTML:
Special watchface for my lover, WatchLover

Do you want to celebrate our love?
Do you want to see the state of being out of love on your wrist?


The less contact with lover, the picture of lover become blurred slowly.

1.Setting my lover’s picture on my watch.

2.The less contact with my lover, the background on the watch will be blurred.

3.It may disappear or not after 24 hours if you never call your lover up.

4.Be in touch.


This application is the WatchFace app specialized in android wear.
